trans-unit.source: You’re sneaky, slippery, and fast. These talents help you hide, move quietly, and pull off tricks that require sleight of hand. Most likely, you’re wiry and small. However, you’re not much of a sprinter—you’re more dexterous than fleet of foot.
trans-unit.target: You’re sneaky, slippery, and fast. These talents help you hide, move quietly, and pull off tricks that require sleight of hand. Most likely, you’re wiry and small. However, you’re not much of a sprinter—you’re more dexterous than fleet of foot.

trans-unit.source: Skill: You’re trained in all stealth tasks.
trans-unit.target: Skill: You’re trained in all stealth tasks.

trans-unit.source: Skill: You’re trained in all interactions involving lies or trickery.
trans-unit.target: Skill: You’re trained in all interactions involving lies or trickery.

trans-unit.source: Skill: You’re trained in all special abilities involving illusions or trickery.
trans-unit.target: Skill: You’re trained in all special abilities involving illusions or trickery.

trans-unit.source: Inability: You’re sneaky but not fast. All movement-related tasks are hindered.
trans-unit.target: Inability: You’re sneaky but not fast. All movement-related tasks are hindered.

trans-unit.source: Initial Link to the Starting Adventure: From the following list of options, choose how you became involved in the first adventure.
trans-unit.target: Initial Link to the Starting Adventure: From the following list of options, choose how you became involved in the first adventure.

trans-unit.source: You attempted to steal from one of the other PCs. That character caught you and forced you to come along with them.
trans-unit.target: You attempted to steal from one of the other PCs. That character caught you and forced you to come along with them.

trans-unit.source: You were tailing one of the other PCs for reasons of your own, which brought you into the action.
trans-unit.target: You were tailing one of the other PCs for reasons of your own, which brought you into the action.

trans-unit.source: An NPC employer secretly paid you to get involved.
trans-unit.target: An NPC employer secretly paid you to get involved.

trans-unit.source: You overheard the other PCs talking about a topic that interested you, so you decided to approach the group.
trans-unit.target: You overheard the other PCs talking about a topic that interested you, so you decided to approach the group.
